IACR ICD-O-3 Histology Description

Source: R/fcds-data.R
iacr_icd_o_3.Rd

Provides the histology codes and morphological descriptions from IACR.

iacr_icd_o_3

Format

A data frame with 2950 rows and 5 variables:

ICDO3_morphology

Five-digit ICD-O-3 morphology code, e.g. "8262/3", matches cancer_ICDO3_morphology

ICDO3

Three-digit ICD-O-3 histology code, e.g. "826"

ICDO3_histology

Four-digit ICD-O-3 histology code, e.g. "8262, matches cancer_ICDO3_histology

level

IACR Level, one of 1, 2, 3, Preferred, Synonym, Related

term

IACR ICD-O-3 description

References

http://www.iacr.com.fr/index.php?option=com_content&view=category&layout=blog&id=100&Itemid=577
